gw.plugin.charge

Interface IChargeInitializer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IChargeInitializer
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    This plugin allows customization of a ChargeInitializer and its InvoiceItem Entries.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void customizeChargeInitializer(ChargeInitializer initializer)
      Customize the ChargeInitializer that will be used to instantiate a Charge.

    • Method Detail

      • customizeChargeInitializer

        void customizeChargeInitializer(ChargeInitializer initializer)
        Customize the ChargeInitializer that will be used to instantiate a Charge. At the point this plugin is called, the Entries will have been created by ths Initializer's ChargeSlicer, and the ChargeInitializer has been marked as "prepared". All values on a ChargeInitializer.Entry may be modified at this point, but some fields on the ChargeInitializer may not be referenced again after the time where this plugin is called.
        Parameters:
        initializer - the ChargeInitializer that is to be modified.
